name: VR - Visit Virtual Reality Beyond Skyline
name_original: VR - Visit Virtual Reality Beyond Skyline
description:
Get a new visualize experience with a real feel of virtual reality beyond the skyline and explore a natural horizon of the world. Take a step into a beautiful landscapes of the world by wearing your cardboard glasses and get a fantasy to take a range over more and more. Buy this game, wear 3d glasses and get ready for an adventurous life and feel your foot into a shoe of an scout. A journey towards virtual reality starts from green lands and will lead you towards an amazing arena of desert. Explore every vista and take an outlook with 360 degree rotation. After exploring each landscape now focus on a circle shows on your screen to get a new terrain. Get ready to travel with your 3d glasses !
How To Play
Tap play and fix your device into a vr glasses.
Enhance visualization with 360 degree rotation.
Use swivel chair or play in an open environment.
Move your head freely up and down to visit an entire landscape.
Features
A real terrain with a realistic 3d environment.
Explore a beauty of nature by wearing your vr glasses.
HD graphics with intersting and beautiful scenery of nature.
A highly addicted game for nature lovers.
Stunning sound effects to engage yourself with a beauty of nature.
